entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
